Replace.Text: Adds a mod section to the in-game Civilopedia which lists currently installed mods and DLC, sorted by active/inactive. This allows you to review details like workshop folder, compatibility, and other information from within your game. Mods and DLC are searchable by title.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adds a Surveyor page with detailed game setup information as well as map profile (terrain, features, resources, etc).
Adds mod and game/map configuration sections to the in-game Civilopedia.
